name: Gritty
one_liner: The chaotic, orange, googly-eyed mascot of the Philadelphia Flyers who became an internet icon of chaos and leftist politics.
meaning: Representing unhinged energy, resilience, and the chaotic nature of public life.
remix_rules: Paired with threatening or revolutionary captions
example_lines: Unbalanced like the eyes on Gritty
Philly in the heart, chaos in the city
